byline.original: By NORMAN MAYERSOHN and DANIEL McDERMON

abstract: Handlebars column review of Moto Guzzi's Norge GT 8V touring bike, Griso SE naked bike and V7 Racer.
snippet: Piaggio, the Vespa maker, bought the venerable motorcycle company Moto Guzzi in 2004. That parentage has given Guzzi the ability to develop a diverse line of touring, naked and sports bikes.
lead_paragraph: Piaggio, the Vespa maker, bought the venerable motorcycle company Moto Guzzi in 2004. That parentage has given Guzzi the ability to develop a diverse line of touring, naked and sports bikes.

headline.main: A Family of Italian Twins That Took a Different Approach
headline.print_headline: A Family of Italian Twins That Took a Different Approach
headline.seo: Italian Twins That Took a Different Approach
